tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE health_data (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    heart_rate INT,
    steps_count INT,
    calories_burned INT,
    sleep_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE health_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    date DATE,
    heart_rate INT,
    steps INT
);

CREATE TABLE wearable_devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE health_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    heart_rate INT,
    steps INT,
    calories_burned INT,
    sleep_hours INT,
    recorded_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE health_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    device_id UUID,
    heart_rate INT,
    steps_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    birthdate DATE,
    gender VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(100),
	age INT,
	gender VARCHAR(10),
	height FLOAT,
	weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE user_health_data (
	health_data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	heart_rate INT,
	step_count INT,
	calories_burned FLOAT,
	distance FLOAT,
	sleep_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
	activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	activity_type VARCHAR(50),
	start_time TIMESTAMP,
	end_time TIMESTAMP,
	calories_burned FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE user_recommendations (
	recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	recommendation_text TEXT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
	preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	preference_type VARCHAR(50),
	value VARCHAR(50)
);
